articles.title: Flame Trees Limited
articles.contents:
Flame Trees Limited
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        Homepage
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        About us
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            About us
            
            
            Clara Pau
            Clara is an applied social researcher from Central Otago. She works closely with Athletics NZ, Canoe Racing NZ, and Netball NZ and has a focus on information gathering in high performance athlete development across NSOs. To high performance sport, she has brought experience in working with communities to undertake culturally competent research, coupling this with effective information gathering techniques that produce meaningful outcomes for communities without compromising cultural safety.
            She has spent time in New Orleans, Louisiana, as part of a Fulbright Graduate Award where she worked on projects concerning political views and voting patterns in Louisiana state, and representation on local boards. She is currently learning te reo Māori and full-stack web development, and enjoys music, NFL, and the outdoors.
            
            
            Dr Jacquie Tran
            Jacquie is a sport scientist and researcher from Melbourne, Australia. Her major areas of interest include: physical preparation and recovery practices for elite athlete and team performance, applying data science techniques to investigate technical and tactical performance in team sport, and organisational learning and mastery practices in performance-focused settings.
            Throughout her career to date, she has provided research leadership and / or direct scientific support to elite athletes, coaches, and support staff in NZ sport (including Rowing NZ, Snow Sports NZ, Hockey NZ, Surf Life Saving NZ, NZ Olympic Committee, and Paralympics NZ) and Australian sport (Australian Institute of Sport, Rowing Australia, Geelong Cats Football Club (Australian Football League), Victorian Institute of Sport). Outside of sport, Jacquie enjoys baking, playing video games, and exploring New Zealand.
            
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Flame Trees Limited
            
            
              
                
                                    
                    
                      Homepage
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      About us

articles.contents:
Flame Trees Limited
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        Homepage
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        About us
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            “Learning from ex-participants of Auckland club rugby” Survey 2021 Competition
            
            Terms and Conditions
            Instructions on how to enter this competition form part of the conditions of entry. By participating, entrants agree to be bound by these terms and conditions and thereby accept these terms and conditions. Entrants must supply full contact details as required and comply with all rules to be eligible for the prize. This competition is in no way sponsored, endorsed or administered by, or associated with or by any other entity.
            
            Competition prizes
            There will be one (1) winner who will receive one (1) x NZD$50 Prezzy® card.
            Competition period: The competition runs from 9:00 AM 23 August 2021 until 9:00 AM 6 September 2021.
            
            
            How to enter
            To enter the competition, entrants must complete the “Learning from ex-participants of Auckland club rugby” Survey 2021 (distributed by Flame Trees Limited) and supply their contact details (via the survey) during the competition period. One entry per individual.
            
            
            Who can enter the competition
            Entry is open to all invited survey respondents who are ex-participants in Auckland club rugby (where “Auckland club rugby” refers to the competitions and clubs that form the Auckland Rugby Union). Employees and contractors of the Auckland Rugby Union are not eligible to enter the competition.
            
            
            Notification of winners
            The prize winner will be notified via phone or email by 30 September 2021 (the Notification).
            Once notified, the winner must accept the prize within one (1) week.
            The winner will be selected by a random draw from all entrants who are eligible.
            A prize will be forfeited and Flame Trees Limited reserves the right to offer the prize to the next eligible runner-up winner if:
            If a winner does not accept the prize within one (1) week of being notified by Flame Trees Limited.
            Flame Trees Limited is unable to contact a winner within 5 working days of being notified.
            A winner is not eligible to apply or breaches these terms and conditions.
            A winner has already been drawn as a winner.
            The prize will be issued via courier to the winner to their selected postal address as confirmed by them when notified as a winner.
            No financial or other consideration will be awarded to any forfeiter.
            
            
            No exchanges / cash alternatives
            The prize must be taken as stated and cannot be exchanged or altered in any way. There will be no cash alternatives. The Prezzy® card is non-transferable and must not be resold.
            
            
            No liability
            Except for any liability that cannot be excluded by law, Flame Trees Limited (including its officers, employees and agents) assumes no responsibility, and excludes all liability (including negligence), for any claims, losses (including loss of opportunity), damages, costs and/or expenses, whether direct, indirect, economic, special or consequential, suffered, sustained or incurred as a result of, or arising in any way out of, or in any way connected with, this “Learning from ex-participants of Auckland club rugby” Survey 2021 Competition, or any of the Products.
            Flame Trees Limited will not be responsible for any damage or loss caused by the winner or to any Third party and the winner indemnifies Te Wananga o Aotearoa for any damages or the like that they have caused or may be involved with in any way.
            
            
            Use of Personal Information
            Personal information submitted by all entrants (including name, email address and postal address) will be collected and used for the purposes of conducting this competition, in accordance with our Privacy Policy accessible here.
            You may contact Flame Trees Limited by phone or email to request access to, or correction of, any of your collected personal information that is held by Flame Trees Limited. If you do not provide accurate and up-to-date personal information, Flame Trees Limited may determine that you are not eligible to win the prize.
            
            
            General
            To the fullest extent permitted by law, Flame Trees Limited does not provide any warranty in respect of, the quality or suitability of any Products or services provided to you by any of our suppliers.
            All decisions of Flame Trees Limited in relation to the “Learning from ex-participants of Auckland club rugby” Survey 2021 Competition are final and binding and no correspondence will be entered into.
            Flame Trees Limited may change these Terms and Conditions at any time as is necessary for reasons beyond its control, in which case participants will be notified of the changes as soon as it is practicable.
            Flame Trees Limited reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel, terminate, withdraw, modify or suspend the Competition (or any part of the Competition, including any Products), or invalidate any entrants from the Competition (or any part of the Competition, including any Products), at any time without prior notice if necessary for reasons beyond its control.
            
            
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Flame Trees Limited
            
            
              
                
                                    
                    
                      Homepage
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      About us
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      Email

articles.title: Flame Trees Limited
articles.contents:
Flame Trees Limited
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        Homepage
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        About us
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            At Flame Trees, we provide research and advisory services to maximise organisational learning and inform the design and implementation of strategy.
            We have expertise in gathering information, managing it with care, and transforming information into useful insights, especially in sporting and community contexts.
            Get in touch with us: info@flametrees.co.nz
            
            Image credit: Jan Smith
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Flame Trees Limited

                      About us

              We have expertise in gathering information, managing it with care, and transforming information into useful insights, especially in sporting and community contexts.
              Get in touch with us: info@flametrees.co.nz
              
              Image credit: Jan Smith

articles.title: Flame Trees Limited
articles.contents:
Flame Trees Limited
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        Homepage
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        About us
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Privacy statement
            We collect your personal information in order to conduct research and consulting activities that we have been contracted to carry out by third parties.
            If you access any of our services (e.g., as a client engaging us to carry out research and consulting services, as a participant in research surveys / interviews / focus groups), we will collect some or all of the following personal information:
            Your name and contact information
            Your address or region
            Your correspondence with Flame Trees Limited staff
            Demographic information such as date of birth, age, gender, and ethnicity
            Survey results and responses, when you participate in any of our surveys
            Interview and focus group recordings and transcripts, when you participate in any of our interviews and / or focus groups
            Any other information you choose to provide us.
            We may also collect personal information from third parties where it is necessary for us to carry out the research and consulting services we have been contracted to complete.
            We keep your information safe by storing it in encrypted files on cloud servers and only allowing certain staff to access it. We keep your information for 6 years after completing the work for which the information was collected, at which point we securely destroy it by securely erasing all digital copies.
            You have the right to ask for a copy of any personal information we hold about you, and to ask for it to be corrected if you think it is wrong. If you’d like to ask for a copy of your information, or to have it corrected, please contact us at info@flametrees.co.nz.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Flame Trees Limited
